org.openimaj.image.feature.local.descriptor

Interface LocalFeatureProvider<T extends FeatureVector>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of FeatureVector
    All Superinterfaces:
    FeatureVectorProvider<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    GradientFeatureProvider
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IrregularBinningSIFTFeatureProvider, SIFTFeatureProvider

    public interface LocalFeatureProvider<T extends FeatureVector>
extends FeatureVectorProvider<T>
    Base interface for classes capable of building local descriptors. Local descriptors are constructed by being handed values in a unit square sampling patch (the patch itself in terms of image coordinates doesn't have to be square, but the coordinates will be normalised to lie in a unit square).
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float getOversamplingAmount()
      Get the amount of required over-sampling outside of the unit square patch.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.openimaj.feature.FeatureVectorProvider

        getFeatureVector

    • Method Detail

      • getOversamplingAmount

        float getOversamplingAmount()
        Get the amount of required over-sampling outside of the unit square patch. An oversampling of 0.5 would result in methods such as SIFTFeatureProvider.addSample(float, float, float, float) being called with pixels in the range -0.5 to 1.5.
        Returns:
        the amount over sampling above the unit square
